backend/main.mo: Defines note and file types, access control, storage mixins, and paywall logic including admin functions to manage user paywall status.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with related files, components, test IDs, and confidence ratings for preview and file handling capabilities.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of major frontend source files including components, hooks, crypto utilities, and deployment scripts.
frontend/deploy-logs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the deploy-logs directory is committed.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_IC.md: Documentation explaining how to deploy the app to IC mainnet with prerequisites and basic deployment steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining design tokens and light/dark theme variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page containing the root element and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Shell script that builds and deploys backend and frontend canisters to IC mainnet with logging and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, actor initialization, profile loading, error screens, and rendering the vault layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an authentication prompt with Internet Identity login for users denied access.
frontend/src/components/auth/Initializat: Shows an initialization failure message with error details and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with handling for auth states and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for entering and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBann: Generic error alert component displaying a title and message.
frontend/src/components/files/FileDetail: Panel for viewing, editing, downloading, and deleting file metadata and content.
frontend/src/components/files/FilePrevie: Displays file previews by decrypting content and supports editing, downloading, and deleting.
frontend/src/components/files/FilesListP: Lists user files with badges and allows selecting a file for detailed viewing.
frontend/src/components/files/FileUpload: Upload widget supporting drag-and-drop, encryption, and progress tracking, gated by storage access.
frontend/src/components/layout/VaultLayo: Main layout controlling vault and admin-access views, handling tabs, selected items, identity, and paywall status to show notes, files, or admin screens.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteDetail: Displays and edits a selected note with encryption support, allowing save, delete, and sharing actions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/notes/NotesListP: Lists user notes, shows ownership or sharing status, and provides a dialog to create new encrypted notes if storage access is enabled.
frontend/src/components/paywall/PaywallP: Shows a locked-access panel explaining paywall restrictions and displays plan and expiration info when available.
frontend/src/components/settings/AdminPa: Admin screen listing all users with storage access, supporting copying principals and revoking paywall permissions.
frontend/src/components/settings/Encrypt: Provides a switch to enable or disable client-side encryption with explanatory text on each state.
frontend/src/components/settings/Paywall: Admin and user paywall panel showing current status and allowing admins to grant or revoke access via mutations.
frontend/src/components/sharing/ShareMan: Dialog for sharing or revoking access to a note or file by entering principal IDs and showing current shared users.
frontend/src/hooks/encryption/useEncrypt: Hook managing per-user encryption settings and providing helpers to encrypt or decrypt text and file bytes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentIdentity.ts: Hook exposing the current identity, authentication state, principal string, and logout function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for user profiles, paywall statuses, admin paywall management, and share/revoke operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated backend actor with timeout handling and returning safe actor state for queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, radius, and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/crypto/vaultCrypto.ts: Implements AESâ€‘GCM encryption/decryption for text and file bytes, plus key generation and base64 utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/async.ts: Provides a helper that wraps a promise with a timeout using Promise.race.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Detects file types, returns MIME types, and checks video playability for previews.
frontend/src/utils/paywall.ts: Calculates paywall state, formats expiration dates, and formats storage sizes from bigint values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and sessionStorage parameter retrieval, persistence, and cleanup for routing contexts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, radius, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for the secure notes/files app.
